Package net.sf.rcer.conn.connections

Interface Summary
IConnection The actual data of a connection at runtime.
IConnectionData A set of connection data used to connect to a SAP R/3 system.
IConnectionProvider  
IConnectionStateListener Interface for an Observer that wants to be notified when the state of a connection changes.
ICredentials The data required to log on to a SAP R/3 system.
ICredentialsProviderWithoutSelection An interface for a class that is able to provide logon credentials for a connection.
ICredentialsProviderWithSelection An interface for a class that is able to select a connection and provide logon credentials.
 

Class Summary
Connection The actual data of a connection at runtime.
ConnectionData This class encapsulates a set of connection data used to connect to a SAP R/3 system.
ConnectionManager The central manager for all active connections to the SAP R/3 systems.
ConnectionRegistry The central registry for definitions of connections to the SAP R/3 systems.
ConnectionType.FromStringConverter A Converter that implements the String to ConnectionType conversion.
ConnectionType.ToStringConverter A Converter that implements the ConnectionType to String conversion.
Credentials A class to transport the connection data and the logon credentials.
ProvidedConnectionData A wrapper for the connection data provided by a IConnectionProvider to ensure that the provider ID is supplied with the connection ID.
 

Enum Summary
ConnectionType The connection type (direct or load balanced).
 

Exception Summary
ConnectionException This exception is thrown by the ConnectionManager if anything goes wrong when trying to establish a connection.
ConnectionNotFoundException This exception occurs if an undefined connection is requested from the ConnectionRegistry or a IConnectionProvider.
ProviderNotFoundException This exception occurs if an undefined connection provider is requested from the ConnectionRegistry.
